actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: One Bite one Claws and one Eldritch Horns or it makes two Arcane Blasts.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 15 (3d6+5) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, 10 ft., one target, 15 (3d6+5) slashing damage.

actions.name: Eldritch Horns
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 18 (2d12+5) force.

actions.name: Serpent Strike
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, 15 ft., one target, 9 (1d8+5) piercing damage + 7 (2d6) poison.

actions.name: Arcane Blast
actions.desc: Ranged Spell Attack: +10 to hit, 120 ft., one target, 21 (3d10+5) force.

actions.name: Searing Breath (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: Dragon head exhales 30' cone of fire that burns and blinds. Each creature in area: 45 (10d8) fire and is blinded until the end of its next turn (DC 17 Dex half damage not blinded).

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.desc: Goat head casts one of the following spells. Cha (DC 18) only verbal components: At will: charm person dispel magic mage hand3/day ea: bestow curse enthrall haste1/day: dominate person

legendary_actions.name: Prideful Prowl
legendary_actions.desc: Moves up to its walking speed or flies up to half its flying speed with o provoking opportunity attacks.

legendary_actions.name: Roar of the King (2)
legendary_actions.desc: Lion head's bellow spurs allies. Each friendly creature including chimera within 30' of it that can hear roar gains 11 (2d10) temp hp and can't be frightened for 1 min.

special_abilities.name: Regal Bearing
special_abilities.desc: The chimera's AC includes its Cha modifier.
